## UserAgent.stop() method

Stop the user agent.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stop(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

## Remarks

Resolves when the user agent has completed a graceful shutdown.

Registerers unregister. Sessions terminate. Subscribers unsubscribe. Publishers unpublish.
